categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: "Nath Alico" was the alias used by a human female spy of the Rebel Alliance's Intelligence division while undercover as a lieutenant in the task force commanded by Captain Ralchio Nervi of the Galactic Empire. After learning that Nervi intended to attack the planet Xorrn, home to former Separatist sympathizers who supported the Rebellion, the agent alerted the rebels.
